title: British Sri Lankan Forum donates £1000 for Resettlement Housing Project of war victims in Sri Lanka
content: British Sri Lankan Forum (BSLF) donated £1000 for the Resettlement Housing Project of war victims in Sri Lanka at a function held recently in Birmingham for the same purpose. The money was raised at a dinner and a musical evening with a patriotic theme held at the Parish Church of All Saints, Queensbury on Saturday…
